name: Professor X
description:
You play as Professor X, a scientist who embarks on a journey into a nuclear fallout zone to rescue the stranded survivors, including your family. The mission is tough and the mutants are tougher, can you soldier on all by yourself or will you have to rely on the unknown supernatural?

How you decide will ultimately decide your ending.

This game was developed during Mini Jam #76 - Radiation, the limitation of the jam is the game has to be playable with one hand.

Link to jam

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-76-radiation
